title: How to Use A.I. to Automate the Dreaded Office Meeting
description: Generating a slide deck, talking points and meetings minutes can all be done in a snap. All you need are the right prompts.

title: Founders of Three Arrows, Failed Crypto Fund, Are Living Large
description: The implosion of Three Arrows Capital, a cryptocurrency hedge fund, devastated the industry. Its two founders spent the next year surfing, meditating and traveling the world.

title: Apple’s Face Computer, Crypto Chaos and How Teens Really Feel About Social Media
description: This isn’t the first time Apple has introduced a bulky piece of hardware that nobody is sure people will want to buy. Can Apple pull off another wearable revolution?
